item.title: Fixing a Broken Home Page
item.description: 1 Posts at Home 2 Breaking Change 3 Tranquilpeak Fix 1 Posts at Home I write this blog using {blogdown} and the Hugo theme blackburn. For now, I can say my skill is limited to R, so I can handle mostly anything {blogdown}-related. I donâ€™t know Hugo and html. I encountered an issue unrelated to {blogdown} recently where the blog could not render the home page properly; it only shows a link to the Posts page.
